name: Conjuncture
description:
Read a journal covering a dire day where the author struggles to find medicine for an illness. In the process you have the power to replace words which changes the course of the story.

Conjuncture is a text based puzzle game. Certain words in the story are possible to take and replace. Solve puzzles by rearranging the story and reach the conclusion.

----Controls----

----Walkthrough----
Take Right from bathroom
Replace Left with Right in bedroom

Take White from hallway
Pick up the White book from the bookshelf

Take Yellow from the garden
Pick up the Yellow book from the bookshelf

Take South from the Yellow book 
Pick up the White book from the bookshelf
Place the trees on the South side of the garden
Take Ten from the parlour
Make the trees Ten years old
Leave Clementine for now

Take 1946 from the storage room
Take Left from the cellar
Open the Left door in the bedroom
Move the valves to the Left
Open the Right door in the bedroom

Take Yellow from the garden
Place the fire in the garden in 1946
Take Grease from the workshop
Take Workshop
Replace Bathroom with Workshop in the cellar
Leave Alcohol for now

Place Red, North and 1951 in empty spaces the hallway, parlour and cellar to make space in the inventory

Take Willow from the garden
Make the logs in the parlour Willow
Take Charcoal

Replace Paint with Grease in the cellar
Take Saltpetre

Take South from the garden
Make the flowers in the garden by to the South
Make the flowers Yellow
Take Sulphur

Take South from the garden
Place the trees on the South side of the garden
Mix Saltpetrem Sulphur and Charcoal in the lock

Take Aspen from the garden
Take Green from the bedroom
Open the Green book from the bookshelf
Replace Oak with Aspen in the book
Open the White book from the bookshelf
Leave Vervain for now

Take Four from the hallway
Take Eight from the attic
Two should be in your inventory from the tree's original age
Place Four and Clementine on the same row
Place Eight and Alcohol on the same row
Place Two and Vervain on the same row
